pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This contains the DRL (Deep Reinforce Learning) Agent to lower delays or boost throughput performace in existing and future TCP Congestion Controls. Other benefits include lower CPU usage.
DRL combines Reinforced Learning and Deep Neural Networks.
Prebuilt modules are provided for BBR, Cubic, Illinois, Westwood.
To run:
# Standalone evaluation (for research only) ./standalone.sh 8000 cubic
# For a real-network or use in production (ebuild mod) DEEPCC_SCHEME=cubic ./real-network.sh
# For starting a new learner model for training ./training.sh 1 44444 cubic
# For contining learner model training ./training.sh 0 44444 cubic
You may use only cubic, westwood, illinois, bbr. To use other schemes, you must mod run-dcubic.sh.
